title: Latvian PM says central bank chief should resign
text:
Latvian PM says central bank chief should resign 11:52am EST - 01:12 
Latvian PM Maris Kucinskis says the head of Latvia’s central bank should resign after his detention by the country's anti-corruption agency ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Latvian PM Maris Kucinskis says the head of Latvia’s central bank should resign after his detention by the country's anti-corruption agency Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sEc9Cj
